channel.title: Infinite Hp Command
channel.description: How would I make a command where you do like... ::maxhp and it gives you 9999999/99 Hp? I get tired of going into the char files and changing it for some of my staff.

item.title: Infinite Hp Command
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

if(command.startsWith("maxhp")) { currentHealth += 999999999; }
^ If you use currentHealth.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinite Hp Command
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote="_™, post:6, topic:285257"]But then you have to go into the attacking packets blah blah blah…

if(command.startsWith("maxhp")) { playerLevel[3] = 99999999; }
Right?[/quote]

You shouldn’t, according to the appendHitUpdate method in wL servers, it should remove the health when they are damaged.

Read full topic

@_Rich wrote:

How about check if they’re an administrator, and if they are, don’t remove their health when they are damaged.

item.title: Infinite Hp Command
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxhp") && playerRights >= 1) {
            playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
            sendMessage("you now have max hp");
            updateRequired = true;

just a guess i dont have a code for it lol cant promise it works
